com.mongodb

Class DBRefBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.DBRefBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBPointer, DBRef

    public class DBRefBase
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a database reference, which points to an object stored in the database.

    While instances of this class are Serializable, deserialized instances can not be fetched, as the db property is transient.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
